Weâre excited to let you be one of the first to know that weâll be taking complete control of the kitchen in busy, 120 cover Merchant City bar Sportsterz!ðð¥³ð³ð±

Weâve been operating on a Deliveroo only basis in Glasgow successfully since October, so this is a massive step for our independent biz and we canât wait to now offer sit-in and collection orders!ð

We would love for you to come down and experience our new venue first hand by attending an exclusive soft launch event on Thursday 20th of April between 5pm-9pm. Youâll be able to enjoy 60% OFF our entire menu to test our in-house ordering systems,as well as our infamous dutch style lager LAGERDAM on tap and ON US!ðºð³ð±ð

We hope we can count on your support and would love to see you there!ð¤ð

messages.content:
Hi!

Weâre hosting a private media launch event with our food truck the day before our public 100 free fries evening on Thursday this week - itâs 6pm-8pm tomorrow (Weds Nov 2nd) at 1 Scotland Street and weâd love for you to come along if youâre able to?!

Weâre an independent Aberdeen based business that only started a year and a half ago! We began life as a little pop-up at a post covid street food event and are now one of the largest independent takeaways in the north-eastâ¦itâs been a wild ride!ð¥µð

This is our first venture in to a new city and due to being completely self-funded by our own reinvestment we havenât got a massive marketing budget like some of the huge competitors in Glasgow, so weâd massively appreciate any support you could offer us to help us spread the word that weâre here!ð¥°ð³ð±ð

Weâll be serving up free portions of our Dirty Dutch fries and are able to cater for veggie, vegan, halal, dairy free and gluten free diets ðºð»

How are you fixed tomorrow - fancy it?ð
